summary_p1: Holding a bachelor's degree in both electrical engineering and business administration gives me a deep understanding of technology driven industries such as machine-to-machine (M2M) communication or Internet of Things (IoT) where I am an expert.
summary_p2: Having worked in product management and sales for over ten years at NetModule, I have gained experience in key functions of business from engineering over product management to sale. As a product manager I learned to analyze the market, define and develop successful products and manage their life-cycles together with the team. As an account manager I learned to win customers and support them in their own projects. Over the years, a considerable network within the industry and beyond has resulted.
summary_p3: Now, it is time for the next step. Currently, I am looking for an interesting challenge aligned with my experience and interests around the topics Internet, web and cloud. Anything further should be discussed individually. Your comments and offers are welcome.
voluntaryService: Voluntary service in Sydney, also travelling in Australia and improving English
